attributes.action: save the jobs of London bus customer assistants
attributes.additional_details: customer assistants are a very important feature of the new London buses they provide a very good service and have prevented many accidents, if the mayor gets his way they will lose their jobs, which is the opposite of what he promised,these jobs were created 3 years ago and the people working these jobs are thought of affectionately by their passengers , so please sign this petition and keep the ca,s in a job. thank you.
attributes.background: on the 11th July bus customer assistants received a letter from their company saying that the London mayor will be dissolving their positions and making them redundant in September.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
